text:
Hi Community,

I was looking on mobile from the preview in HubSpot and also from an Iphone. How can I centre the text where it says "get started" an make it look better that is on the page here? <https://www.incoognito.com/home>

i'm creating a new module using the `@HubSpot/create-cms-project` when i do `hs watch --portal=<portal> src .`  the project gets uploaded, but it doesn't remove any existing files in the HubSpot CMS, right?
correct, you would need to enable the optional remove flag for that function.
